column4: I would like to delete all the windows applications in wine and just to re-check, the command would be "rm -rf ~/.wine" Is that right or do I have to prefix it with sudo?
that should work, then you have to call another comman to rebuild .wine
I tried using that command but I didn't notice any change
I'm new to wine and I had no .wine dir, after callitg that or something else it seemed to be build and had a few essentual looking applications such as explorer.exe
